data.message: Why don't you make a new coke with natural low sugars instead of trying to avoid the sugar tax and not use stuff like aspartame and actually naturally get the colour of your coke by natural ways instead of using cancer causing ammonia chemicals and methylimidazoleto to dye it anyone that drinks two cans of this a day is asking for trouble and it should be banned from consumption, the vessels it's stored and made in, I can't understand why FDA allows this carcinogenic drink to be produced and consumed cause I can bet in the future stuff will be banned in this drink something mass produced in America for profit and greed not caring its killing everyone as long as they get their sales....
